guideline.name: Annotation of CPIC Guideline for tramadol and CYP2D6

relatedGenes.name: cytochrome P450 family 2 subfamily D member 6

recommendations.name: Recommendation PA166298598

text.html: Avoid tramadol use because of potential for toxicity. If opioid use is warranted, consider a non-codeine opioid.

implications: CYP2D6: Increased formation of O-desmethyltramadol (active metabolite) leading to higher risk of toxicity

recommendations.name: Recommendation PA166298585

text.html: Use tramadol label recommended age- or weight-specific dosing.

implications: CYP2D6: Expected O-desmethyltramadol (active metabolite) formation

recommendations.name: Recommendation PA166298589

text.html: Avoid tramadol use because of potential for toxicity. If opioid use is warranted, consider a non-codeine opioid.

implications: CYP2D6: Increased formation of O-desmethyltramadol (active metabolite) leading to higher risk of toxicity

recommendations.name: Recommendation PA166298580

text.html: Use tramadol label recommended age- or weight-specific dosing. If no response and opioid use is warranted, consider non-codeine opioid.

implications: CYP2D6: Reduced O-desmethyltramadol (active metabolite) formation

recommendations.name: Recommendation PA166298584

text.html: Use tramadol label recommended age- or weight-specific dosing.

implications: CYP2D6: Expected O-desmethyltramadol (active metabolite) formation

text.html:
xN is not a valid input for CYP2D6 copy number alleles. Please select a copy number representation as outlined below.

xN Allele Possible selection
*1xN *1x2 or *1x≥3
*2xN *2x2 or *2x≥3
*3xN *3x2
*4xN *4x2 or *4x≥3
*6xN *6x2
*35xN *35x2
*36xN *36x2
*43xN *43x2
*45xN *45x2
  • For normal function alleles (*1 and *2) selecting *1x2 versus *1x≥3 or *2x2 versus *2x≥3 will affect the resulting CYP2D6 phenotype.
  • CPIC CYP2D6 ultrarapid metabolizer phenotype is assigned an activity score (AS) of >2.25.
  • DPWG CYP2D6 ultrarapid metabolizer phenotype is assigned an AS of >2.5.
Guideline CNV Allele Function Activity
value		 Other Allele
Function		 Activity
value		 CYP2D6 AS Phenotype
CPIC or DPWG *1x2 Increased 2 No function 0 2 Normal metabolizer
CPIC or DPWG *1x2 Increased 2 Decreased function 0.25 2.25 Normal metabolizer
CPIC *1x2 Increased 2 Decreased function 0.5 2.5 Ultrarapid metabolizer
DPWG *1x2 Increased 2 Decreased function 0.5 2.5 Normal metabolizer
CPIC or DPWG *1x2 Increased 2 Normal function 1.0 3.0 Ultrarapid metabolizer
CPIC or DPWG *1x≥3 Increased ≥3 ≥3 Ultrarapid metabolizer

recommendations.name: Recommendation PA166298587

text.html: Avoid tramadol use because of possibility of diminished analgesia. If opioid use is warranted, consider a non-codeine opioid.

implications: CYP2D6: Greatly reduced O-desmethyltramadol (active metabolite) formation leading to diminished analgesia.
